website_summaries.verdict: Good price point for a test prep book that provides the basics you'll need to have success.
pros: Excellent collection of practice questions that mimic what you'll find on the ASWB test
Book doesn't just provide an answer key for the practice questions, but it also explains why answers are correct
cons: No detailed advice for learning how to study for this particular social work exam

customer_reviews.title: Great help!
customer_reviews.text: This book gave me a lot of valuable information! A great aid to use when the ASWB!
customer_reviews.author: Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: t's easy to comprehend, great test strategies, and the practice test questions are on target.
customer_reviews.author: MackieMac

customer_reviews.title: I would like to rate the book a 5 because it provides ...
customer_reviews.text: I would like to rate the book a 5 because it provides the questions and in the back it provides the answers and the explanation why the chosen answer is the correct answer.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Pham

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This book said I would pass the exam! I passed the exam because I studied and knew the material! This was the biggest waste of money! Nothing in this book was relevant. Do Not Buy!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Not very helpful for me
customer_reviews.text: Was no that helpful for me. I actually used my friends ASWB secrete exam book (yellow) and that REALLY helped me. I passed the first time.
customer_reviews.author: AllisonX

customer_reviews.title: Tons of Practice Questions, Great Guide.
customer_reviews.text: This is great study and prep book. Filled with practice questions, you will get the information and be able to pass your test with ease. I received this book at a promotional rate in exchange for an honest and unbiased review, and I honestly have to say that it is 1000 times better than I thought it was going to be. It helps you to fully understand what exactly you are reading and then continuously tests you with practice questions, eventually all the right info sticks and you know you will pass your test, when you see how confident your are that you know the correct answer after this guide helping you. I love it, and all the practice questions.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for Bachelor Exam!
customer_reviews.text: Taking the ASWB exam can be so stressful but having this study guide has been so incredibly helpful! The layout is easy to use since it guides you through your study time and then offers opportunities to complete a practice test to ensure you have retained what you've studied. It's been a lifesaver for me as I prepare and it has made me feel more confident in my test taking abilities. I'm thankful to have come across this review book for my bachelor's exam. Thank you to ASWB Bachelors Exam Team for allowing me to purchase this item at a discount in exchange for my honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine84

customer_reviews.title: This is a great help for studying as a book because the way ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this product for free in exchange of my honest review. This is a great help for studying as a book because the way it is organized will help you remember, study, plan and afterwards test yourself with the test in the middle of the book and then check the answers. It is very interesting to work with a book like this and very helpful. In the answers section you will find the explanation for every question in the test and why the correct answer is that. The explanations are detailed and the information provided in beginning of the book is essential, concise and logically organized.
customer_reviews.author: Renina Varfaj

customer_reviews.title: ASWB Exam Practice Test Questions
customer_reviews.text: Preparing for the ASWB Exam? If so, I highly recommend this Trivium Study Exam Prep and Practice Test Questions. It is well written and formatted. It comes with 150 practice test questions. The is a great help to see what potential questions, may arise in the final exam. After the test questions, you find the section with the answers, to see how well you did. It also, has a short explanation on why that is the correct answer. By reviewing the taking the questions, you will definitely obtain a great score on the exam. I received this book in exchange for an honest review.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: This is a great study book.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great study book. I know there are other resources available online, but I'm a traditional girl and like a pen and paper copy that I can sit down with and read while turning the pages. The questions are easy to read and the text is a clear typeface. I received this item at a discounted price in exchange for my honest opinion. To read more of my reviews, check out my Instagram @FixItWithFran or follow me on Facebook or my blog FixItWithFran.com
customer_reviews.author: Fix-it With Fran

customer_reviews.title: Great practice questions!
customer_reviews.text: The book begins with an introduction about the ASWB Bachelors Exam. There is an 150 question multiple choice practice exam. Answers and explanations are separate from the questions. The end of the book also contains a glossary of common test terms. I definitely recommend these practice questions. I received this book at a discount to review; however, that does not affect my honest opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Wetzel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read and use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to read and use. Great study guide for students who worry about passing the first time. I did receive this item for free for my unbias review.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Greenhood

customer_reviews.title: Great Book!
customer_reviews.text: Very good book with lots of information, very thorough and would recommend to anyone studying for the ASWB exam. Not filled with junk just straight to the point. I would highly recommend this book! I received at a discount for review.
customer_reviews.author: Kristimichele

customer_reviews.title: exam prep
customer_reviews.text: Great guide with good examples of what you need to pass the exam. Disclosure: I recieved this product at a discount in exchange for my honest review. All opinions are my own
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent study guide!!!
customer_reviews.text: This manual is extremely wordy and ultra detailed for the type of questions they will ask you on the exam. Very pleased!!!! I received this product at discount in exchange for an honest review.
customer_reviews.author: imagin4more

product_meta.title: ASWB Exam Practice Test Questions: Review Questions for the ASWB Bachelors Exam
